channel.title: Jst need a little help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've hosted a few servers before and i don't know whats happening now.
i've just recently got a new Wireless Router, so im not sure if i've portforwarded Correctly,
But, When i run my server and client and log in from the client i get this message on the runserver.bat
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/a3mn2r.jpg[/img]
if you know what to do, Help me out please.
-Matt

The compiler tell’s you the exact location where the exception is accruing.

item.title: Jst need a little help
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“mattbruce93, post:8, topic:274088”][/quote]Somebody who’s ‘bad at something’, in my opinion, has actually tried to do whatever it is they’re bad at themselves.

You seem to know nothing and also seem to be unwilling to try and attempt fixing it yourself. Go read some tutorials on Java.
[/quote]

I’ve Actually Tried to fix myself and i still cannot do thats why i’ve come here.
[/quote]I highly doubt with your “whats a variable rofl” question you’ve made any ‘real’ attempts at fixing it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Jst need a little help
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“mattbruce93, post:6, topic:274088”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=362167.msg2753152#msg2753152 date=1240025446]
My guess is that the connection’s not being closed properly, and thus: connection reset.

Not much to help figure out the problem in there.

And why are you blocking out your default gateway address…? It’s not like anybody can do anything with it.

Please learn at least some basic programming skills before even thinking about coming here.

[/quote]

Sorry i’m so bad at this but how would i fix that?[/quote]Somebody who’s ‘bad at something’, in my opinion, has actually tried to do whatever it is they’re bad at themselves.

You seem to know nothing and also seem to be unwilling to try and attempt fixing it yourself. Go read some tutorials on Java.

Read full topic
